channel.title: How to actually run your server?
channel.description:
I've Port Fowarded,no-ip hosted,and i have the cmd running and noone can still connect plzz help anyone!
My Msn is Christopherrovelli1@hotmail.com if anyone can help just post on here or IM me Thanks!

item.title: How to actually run your server?
item.dc:creator: @Code_kai Code kai
item.description:
@Code_kai wrote:

Lwut:

code Kai i have port fowarded but i just need it so people can play it

Change the IP on your gui.java to your servers ip like this.

sign.signlink.startpriv(InetAddress.getByName("Your server's IP here"));

Also go to your client.java and do crtl + F to search 0.0.0.0 or 127.0.0.0 and delete them and put your server’s IP there

NOte this is client sided so don’t do anything in your server.

Read full topic
item.source: How to actually run your server?

item.title: How to actually run your server?
item.dc:creator: @Code_kai Code kai
item.description:
@Code_kai wrote:

demon fox337:

i have utorrent and that works for me set it up go to options >prefrences>connection run your server then type 43594 in the port box on utorrent and click apply and ok

Utorrent sucks, just manually portforward at 192.168.1.1…

Read full topic
